sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define competitors, substitutes, and alternatives with a structured analysis to inform positioning and roadmap.

sections.title: Segmentation & ICP Fit
sections.content: Segment markets and map competitor strengths/weaknesses by ICP, use case, and vertical.

sections.title: Feature & Value Comparison
sections.content: Capability matrix, outcomes, pricing posture, integrations, developer experience, and ecosystem.

sections.title: Differentiation & Moat
sections.content: Unique strengths, defensibility, switching costs, network effects, and roadmap bets.

sections.title: Implications & Plays
sections.content: Messaging moves, sales plays, pricing/packaging considerations, product bets, and risks.
